briefTitle: Ice Plant Intensive Cream for the Prevention of Hand-Foot Syndrome in Breast Cancer: Pilot Randomized Controlled Trial
officialTitle: Feasibility of an RCT to Investigate the Efficacy of Ice Plant Intensive Cream for the Prevention of Hand-foot Syndrome in Patients With Breast Cancer Receiving Therapy With Doxorubicin and/or Docetaxel: Pilot Randomized Controlled Trial
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of patients that can be recruited in a 9 months time period
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Breast cancer patients
* Therapy with Doxorubicin and/or Docetaxel
* Karnofsky performance status scale \> 80
* Informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients with previous skin disease and/or polyneuropathy
* Intolerance or allergic reaction on at least one ingredient of Ice Plant Intensive Cream
* Already receiving chemotherapy
* Usage of Ice Plant Intensive Cream before trial
* Severe physical or psychological illness due to which the patient is not able to participate in the study
* Lack of German language skills
